DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate whether oral administration 200 mg/day lactoferrin ( LF ) low birth weight infant reduce late onset sepsis necrotising enterocolitis effect LF regulatory T cell .
DOC.criteria: Inborn infant Gestational age < 32 week Birth weight < 1500 g Parental consent Congenital abnormality Severe perinatal asphyxia
